snippet: Around the world, nearly every asset class is expensive by historical standards.
abstract: The Upshot; prices for nearly every asset class around the world are high by historical standards, bringing economic risks and lower returns for investors; big question for global economy is what happens next in wake of current boom and possibly bubble.
lead_paragraph: Around the world, nearly every asset class is expensive by historical standards.

headline.main: Welcome to the Everything Boom, or Maybe the Everything Bubble
headline.print_headline: From Stocks to Farmland, All’s Booming, or Bubbling
